text: Who is this? Whats all these crackers at this time?  He is bursting crackers. What is this? Is he welcoming us?
This is awesome. Nothing to say for this.
Why are you in a coat and suite?
This is non stop crackers. It isnt stopping. Awesome.
This is awesome.   Isnt there an end to this? Why isnt it getting over?
He was sleeping. Hearing the crackers sound, he is now looking at it.
Its our Thrissur pooram style. First crackers and then music.
Saleeshettan looks awesome in this outfit.
All looking great in suites.
This is a big surprise for us. I never expected this.   Its a celebration. Dont you want a change in your life.
This is for you. Thank you so much for that warm welcome.
Last time for INB trip, we came together after flag off.   Do you remember the traffic block in Coimbatore town that day?  You then drove for a while. I thought of that when I came today.
We are here to have a nice trip.
All of you should support and bless us.   Not only that. We have a request too.
Let him join us once too.   I will have to ask my boss for that.
I shall ask for you.   Dont you think so?'  Saleeshettan is our dearest person.
Photographer Nischal. Dont we need the chillies of Nepal.   You should surely that when you go there.
I will think of you and have it.   We shall send you a picture of it from there.   Thank you so much to all here. You surprised me again.
Isnt this over. First it was crackers, then cake and now what?
There is smoke often.   You can give it to her. We are in a red theme today.
You can have this.
Wishing you all the best and a happy journey.
We went last time as bachelors. This time he is going the same route with his family.
That too with such a small child in the car. So the experiences will be shared here
For me Tamil is like Malayalam only.
You had taken a lot of videos on Canon G76 when we went on our INB trip.
Have you lost them?  He used to sit at the back seat and take videos through the window
We took a lot of videos that time.   Thats a Macbook. I dont know to use all that.
Saleeshettan, its not cricket that you have to play. There is kids National anthem.
Baa Baa black sheep, wheels on the bus, cocomelon. Thats what you should play
Kids sit quite when they hear all that.   Sing baa baa black sheep...
The lemon fan has got a lemon wedge in his hand.   He is crazy about lemon. He will eat it immediately.
He loves lemon?  If he loves lemon, be careful. Bacardi!
He is an expert to show expressions after having lemon.   He will fall now showing expressions. Slowly.
He has become familiar with Saleeshettan now. Seeing you many times.
Whats that.   Our todays dinner had hot rasam. I almost finished it.
Grilled pineapple with mint chutney.   Grilled mushroom  Tandoori chicken too.
Looks awesome.   Its juicy and awesome.   Kichadi for Rishikuttan.
Its our first night stay. We will take things just for tonight and clothes for tomorrow
We will have to take some out and put it back.  We dont have to take all the things to the room.
The back of the car is very colourful.   They have given us a room near the family swimming pool.   Mom and me is the name of the room.
This is our room today. Shall show you the rest tomorrow.   I am full tired. Have to edit the video and go to sleep.
Its morning. Yesterdays surprise was too good. Saleeshettan surprised us.
I shall show you the room today.   We stayed at their beautiful mom and me room.
You have one swimming pool here and another one here.   We are not getting into the pool now. Our first priority is our trip.
We are not here to enjoy the resort this time.  We will leave after having breakfast.
They have rooms up and down here. We stayed in room number 1
Rishi is cranky in the morning itself.   Whats the problem?
He is restless.   Whats your problem?  Have you shat?
Good boy. Shall we go?  We have  lots of work today. Come lets go.
Swetha, he might be hungry. Lets have food. Whats on your head?
Its a band.  Looks good. Wear it always.
We used an extra bed in this room.   Had to iron some clothes in the morning. Done with it.
Now lets go.   The main difficulty in a journey is taking boxes to the room daily and sorting things
We wont be staying at any place more than one day. I found a way for it.
We have kept each persons dresses in separate covers. Mine separate.
Swethas in another pack and Abhis in another one.   We have packed winter clothes in another pack too.
Be careful. His hand may get stuck in there.   So we will be taking the clothes we want form one pack to the room.
Will put the used ones in another pack and keep them separately.
Thats how we have planned things.   After some days, we shall courier those used clothes home.
That many things get reduced from the car.  We have done that earlier. Anyways 1st day things have moved on smooth.
I first thought of putting dresses in a carton box.
But when I tried that, it consumed a lot of space.   I felt it took a lot of space. So thought of this plastic bags and cover plans.
You will learn how to save space and make things easier as you travel.
Do you want food?  He cannot resist himself seeing the pool. Lets wet his legs for him.
All of us have been having throat issues for the last few days.
All of us tested Covid. But we arent Covid +ve.   All of us are having sound issues and differences with that.
We have just begun our trip. Both of them are having their 1st long road trip.
So we will be a bit slow and delay in things.  Swimming pool! You leave him there, he will run and jump into it.
Its because we are not keeping well.  My mother specifically said not to take him to the pool.
Its risky. If anybody has a fever or anything, all will go down.
Then we will have to go to hospitals and so. So should be very careful in journeys.
Look at him beating his legs in the water.   He didnt wet his pants.   You dont have to make an issue for that.
It is wet.   Yes the pants got wet.
We have put all the used clothes in a bag. Rest are also kept in the car.
Its ok, right. One of my bags is in the front.   All set? Then close it.
Awesome. Why are you in love with me in the morning itself?  Who said I am giving it to you. I was showing you its beauty.
I thought you were giving me roses in the morning.   Look at her.
All the wives are like this only after marriage and having a child.   All the men face the same situation.
He is feeling hungry. Give him food.   He wants this.   Give it to him. Lets open the gift Saleeshettan gave us yesterday.
Give him the roses.   There was a smaller one too. Open that also. Lets see.
Can hear the sound of peacocks.  Chocolates!  Both of you would be happy.
These are those oats bar, nutritious bars, muesli bars etc.
Another box of chocolates. Awesome.   So we have lots of chocolates to have on the way. Give him one.
Eat it.   The most waste we will have during  our journey is
Rishis daipers and Swethas napkins.  Thats what we will have the most.
Never throw any of them on the roads.
You can compostable bags. They are not plastic.
I bought this from LuLu. Put them in this and dispose it at garbage or junk places
You may have them in the hotels you stay or garbage bins on the road.
We should responsibly discard them at such places.   Never throw such things on the road or outside anywhere.
Especially diapers. At home, you can burn them   But you cannot do that during travels.
Since I am not looking at him, he fought and got my attention.
He is happy now.   Now lets go to have food.
This is the dust of just 1 day. As we get in and get out, there will be lots of it.
We have to clean this daily. We wont be able to wash our car daily.
Buy a good air freshener inside the car.  I had bought one. Didnt have time to open it. Shall do that after having food.
Come lets go. All are feeling hungry.   Yes lets go. Everyday I will drive the first 5kms and then gvie it to Abhi
Yes. Lets go.   Always wipe the dust in the car too. You will have dust in here for sure.
Where are you going? He is jumping and coming forward.
Never make your child sit in the front when the car is moving. Ive seen many do that
Only when the car is moving. If we happen to sudden brake or have an accident,
They wont be able to bear the airbag. Its very dangerous.
I have seen many husbands drive and the wife sits with the child in the front.   From the time Rishi was born, even if its just 3 of us, Swetha and Rishi sits behind
Kids may cry or be arrogant for it. But never let that happen.
When you parents came here for their honeymoon, we planted a tree here.
Shall show you that tree.   This is the one.
They have fenced it. Banyan tree and mango tree.
Its been 3 years since we planted it. It was in 2019.
Good morning Saleesh uncle.  We are growing old. So thought of wearing glasses.  He is all set for breakfast. We are having idly for breakfast.
He will have. You shouldnt scare him.   You should speak soft and make him eat.
We said we would leave by 10am. Its already 10.30am.
Eat as much as idly sambar dosa and vadas you want.  You wont get much of them again.
You will get idly and sambar. But wont be as tasty as this.   You will get good food until you cross Karnataka.
From Goa onwards, it will be different.   What will we give Rishikuttan then?
I will find it difficult in the mornings.   It will be difficult at his breakfast time
You get more of pooris and all. Anyways shall see.   When you come to Tamil Nadu, you must have filter coffee.
I have had the best filter coffee from Tamil Nadu only.   You have many places that make the best filter coffees.
You can see a lot of shops on the highways that sell filter coffee.   We are having one from here after having idly.
Its awesome.   Hello Sir. What are you upto? Thats my tripod.
He puts everything down and plays with them.   Those who travel a lot or keep your car in the hot sun should have this in the car.
We have this from our previous INB trip onwards.   When we serviced our car last day, I changed the old and this is a new one
Good air black. Its an air purifier. Its a new product.  You get them only from their website goodair.in
When you place the car in the hot sun, this portion turns hot.
Fuels and toxic fuels are released from the dash board then.   We have food, waste, old dresses etc in the car too.
All these smell begin to turn stinky in the car later.   Sometimes we wont be able to bear it.
Usually people use air fresheners like this.
This gives us a good smell in the car and spreads with the air of ac.
But this purifier absorbs the bad smell and makes it odourfree
You can buy this from goodair.in website or from amazon.
The new product is available only on their website.   You can get the old variants in amazon.
Its available in UAE, Qatar, Australia and Saudi Arabia.
This is all it is. It comes in a plastic cover like this.
Its an awesome premium packing.   You just have to remove the plastic pack and hand it in your car.
You wont feel anything bad in it. It has a premium product feel
It will hang and stay there.   Its a simple product. You dont have to recharge it with current or anything.
You just have to put it in the sun for 2-3 hours a month.   Nothing else to be done You can use it for 2-3 years in your car.
Regarding the rate. You can use these air fresheners for maybe 1-2 months.
For 2 months, how much you have to pay for this.  If you compare both of them, this is far better.
What reminds you when you come here?  We came and stayed here for many days. Had lots of fun.
Which was the car that we had come here in?
The white one, range rover. We had taken that from here.   Was it range rover? It was Rolls Royce.
We did many videos with that.
We had stayed in a room behind this stage.   Both of them are upto something. They are playing with my son
He doesnt want us now. He is enjoying. Whats up?
Whom is he calling from here?
Wow!
What was this ones name?  Donald  This is our own old Donald. We named the other ones with our staffs names
Saw Donald drinking water?  He touched a rabbit.
Where is it?  Take it. Lets see.  You dont have to take it. Just go there  Wont it run away?
You get in there.   How cute they are. Let Abhi get in.
Look at the rabbits.   Ramesh and Suresh.
The white one with white eye is Ramesh and the other one is Suresh.
Suresh and Ramesh come here.  They are having carrots
The rabbits are eating like how Rishi baby eats food.   He played with it earlier.
5 of them.  Is it biting his legs?
The rabbits are licking Rishis feet.
Rabbits are so cute.   People cook and eat them. Should kill those people.
I cannot have it.  Be careful. He shouldnt harm them.
Now he is plucking grass Wash his hands for him.   Come and have carrots
Swetha says I am scared of them.   He is scared to feed the pigeons too.
Thats pigeons. I am scared of rabbits.  Abhi, wasnt he scared that day?
Dont simply insult me in front of all.   Suresh n Ramesh.. come and finish this.
They dont want cabbages. They love carrots.   They wont eat my hand thinking its carrots, right?
They took it and went. They will have it from there now.   Look at the elephant. We touched it. Elephant of Aanakatti.
Saleeshettans elephant.
If you ask him how does the elephant make noise, he will say Aaaaaa..  Rishikuttan sit on the elephant's tusk.
We sat on it.   Saleeshettan .. speak on something motivating for us on our journey.
I am not saying anything. Let Saleeshettan speak on it.   What is there to motivate. Its actually different.
Its different from 2019 that we went and now what you are going to go.
You experience the world when you see it.   We dont learn a lot by traveling only by flight or train.
We learn more about each village and place when we go by road.   How many countries have you completed so far?
20 countries.  Was this your first trip then?  No. My first trip was to Thailand.
I am sure this would be a well experienced trip for a family.
Many go with bachelors and groups.   How to travel with a small child just 1 year old in different terrains and climate.
I am sure this would be the best video showing you how to travel with a family.
We had gone to a place with a bridge, a beautiful place in Bhutan  We had seen a family come in a Thar. We then thought how they came in this heat.
That was not the new Thar but the old one.   This video will tell you everything for sure.
You might have seen the space and set up in the car.  They have seen it in yesterday's video
I am happy that Abhi has become a good driver.   Its not a joke driving so many kilometers.
Exactly. In this young age. He is just 20 years old.   Though he looks like 30, he is just 20 years old.   Later people will ask me if I am his younger brother.
I dont like driving but you drive very well. Thats a great thing.
Its nice to drive when traveling. But a person has to operate a camera too.   I would love to drive but I have to shoot too.
Lot of things to look into. Rishi is also there.   Should take care of Swetha, Abhi and myself too.
What all should I take care of?  You would've understood morning to evening how it is to feed n change a child
I said we have to leave by 10am and now its already 11am.   We still havent left. Rishi woke up, had to wait for his morning rituals, feed him etc..
If he doesnt go to the toilet in the morning, its difficult for him. Just like us.   He doesnt know to say that. He has to be fed on time or will be cranky.
He has to be put to sleep on time. Once he is in the car, he will sleep off.   How are you planning the trip? At what time will you stop your journey daily?
When we traveled that day, we used to drive more and tried to reach faster.   To reduce staying, we used to drive more and travel more.
In winter expedition, we drove from Kochi to Hyderabad.   We cannot do that this time.
Thats why I am going to Mysore from Anakatti.   Its just 250kms from here. From Mysore we will be going to Jog falls.
Its less than 350-400kms. But we will take around 7-8 hours of travel.   So we can drive maximum just 7-8 hours a day.
We have to reach our room before its night.   Only when we reach our room, I can edit our video.   Though I can do little from the car, rest can be done only from the room.
Look at the difference. Last time when we went, you did your work and we did ours  Today you have a baby with you.
Abhi with us is a big support too. Its very good.   If it was just the 3 of you, you would have had a tough time.  Thats true. If it was just Swetha, Rishi and me, it would have been difficult.
Thats because he is too small. If he was 3-4yrs old, would have been manageable.
He hasnt started walking too. If he knew to walk, we could leave him here.
But since he is still in his crawling stage, I cannot leave him here.
He may get down. But we are tensed thinking about his knees and rest.  We have to be careful about that. Once they walk, things may be easier.
But otherwise, since Abhi is also with us, its very helpful for all.
Abhi drives, takes care of Rishi and does all the work.   Abhi. you do everything.
We will surely miss Saleeshettan when we go to Bhutan.   If you can join us for at least 1-2 days, please do come.
Saleeshetta, you have to come to eat Ema datshi with us.   You should surely have it. Dont forget.   Ema datshi and chilli is an awesome combination
By the time we reach Leh, you can take a flight to Delhi and then Leh.   If you get in from here in the morning, you can reach Leh in the evening.
You can be with us at Leh for 2-3 days and take a flight back here.
Its your duty to get the permission of my boss.   Its a busy time. Even that time nothing was ready here.
It was in 2019.   Now its awesome. Those days, the work had just begun.
Saleeshettan joined us when work was in progress.   Now its season for them.   But the way you welcomed us with those fire works like Trissur pooram,
We are so happy for that. Thank you so much. I never expected that.   Our plans were to just come here, meet you and go today.
Boss said he would try to come yesterday. Today also he said he will try to meet you  He had come to Kochi that day. I have not seen him travel or go to many functions
But he said we have to go for this.  Happy for that. Thank you so much.
I wanted to show you a video from here to Mysore.
But since todays video has many contents, I am stopping it here.   We will be going via Veerappans Ghat section Sathyamangalam to Mysore.
Its Sathyamangalam Chamrajnagar route.   From Anakatti, we will be crossing a lot of forest and mountains.
You can see a video tomorrow from here via Sathyamangalam to Mysore  All the best.  Thank you so much.
Awesome.
He is a good friend and a motivator of ours  Hello. Sorry I couldnt come yesterday.
Yesterday was a surprising welcoming for us.   We are on a journey.
Very happy for that. Have a safe journey.  Go enjoy your journey.
Good we could meet him before we left.   Which all places are you covering this time?
We will be going to places that we didnt go last time.   There are lot of places.
I am focusing on North East mainly.   North East and some unexplored places in Ladakh.
Lets see.   Sice we are traveling with family, have to see our health and weather conditions.
Wheres your little one?  He is sleeping.  He is ok with everything, right?
So far all good.  Have a safe journey. Drive slowly.
Do call if you need anything.   Thank you so much.  Happy journey.  Thank you. Bye bye.
